✉️来自CEO史蒂夫·丹顿的一封信

Dear Friends,

What a week of table tennis, what a week for the ITTF. In my period with the sport never have I remembered so many historical moments. Sweden has stood and delivered. WOW.

The ITTF was BRAVE and dug deep into their hearts to help our Korean friends unite for peace.
The matches from the teams were breath-taking. China, outstanding as usual. Sweden medalling on home soil. Japan and Germany with honourable efforts in the finals and so many great matches from all other teams who not only competed but also participated.

For the ITTF - the AGM and BOD gave those of us who have been fighting for ITTF 2.0 the full mandate to go ahead with our new plans:
- A new Governance approach with changes to our constitution.
- A strategic plan.
- The ITTF Foundation.
- The pathway to build a more visible World Table Tennis Championships.

Many other achievements were made and with this full support we can now go ahead with absolute confidence with our projects. There is still some education needed with those that are still unsure of our direction but we will manage that in the near future. But of course as was in the name you beautiful song - “without the master plan your bound for the garbage can”.

The week personally bought me and my trusted team absolute clarity on the whole situation in which we try our best to professionally operate. Of course, like in all organisations after massive philosophical directional change there are some loose ends to clean up, but nothing that can slow our momentum and continue to take us to the next level. My mind is totally buzzing with excitement about where we can take the sport after this change.

Not to name everyone as there is too many of you but a huge thanks to all who made the champs a great success - and a special thanks to the Swedish Table Tennis Association and city of Halmstad. The support our President Mr. Thomas Weikert, and the whole EC gives myself, Raul Calin our Secratary General and our whole wonderful group of staff is truly phenomenal as well.

It is time to get some rest for at least this week, as we now have a huge job to do to ensure our plans and goals are reached.

With PEACE and LOVE from my soul.

Steve Dainton
CEO
